page.title: 10Work in Ulverston
page.content: {Employment}is highly dependent on local firms: 40% work in the manufact_ uring site in S. Ulverston,25% in Glaxo. Many residents work in Barrow. Tourism is a source of jobs in pubs, cafes,hotels,etc. {Unemployment}is about the national average. The Job Centre has vacancies which remain unfilled because of unsuitable hours,pay,locations,but for one job as Process-worker at Glaxo over 100 applied. {Furness and Cartmel Plan 1984}notes a need to encourage local enterprise. New sites for industrial development by 1996 have been allocated. The Town Council is keen to see that its voice is heard by the County Council in Carlisle and S. Lakeland District Council in Kendal and that the interests of local residents are safe- guarded.
